## Overview 

[sqrrl](http://sqrrl.com) is a Big Data company that provides products for Apache Accumulo.

We are focused on Big Data challenges both in terms of scale and analytic complexity where data is constrained by legal, regulatory, or other restrictions. Our products promote data integration, secure information sharing, and data-driven solutions.

With sqrrl, Big Data becomes __secure__, __scalable__, and __adaptable__ to a wide variety of data environments and analytical requirements

### Apache Accumulo

Apache Accumulo™ is a sorted, distributed key/value store. It handles large amounts of structured, semi-structured, and unstructured data as a robust, scalable, and real-time data storage and retrieval system. It can be integrated with any Hadoop deployment.

Apache Accumulo has three unique technical advantages over other comparable database solutions:

*   __Security:__ Fine-grained security controls allow organizations to control
    data at the cell-level and promote a data-centric security model without 
    degrading performance. Download sqrrl’s Cell-Level Security Data Sheet here.
*   __Scalability:__ Accumulo is proven to operate and perform at massive scale 
    (i.e., petabytes of data) with low administrative overhead
*   __Adaptability:__ sqrrl’s solutions enable users to move beyond Hadoop batch 
    processing and conduct a wide variety of real-time analyses, including information 
    retrieval, statistical, graph, and visualizations across diverse data environments.

For more information go to [http://accumulo.apache.org](http://accumulo.apache.org/).

## Product

Acorn builds upon the open source version of Apache Accumulo to include additional features that make Big Data secure, scalable and adaptable. These features focus on ease of use, security extensions, and advanced analytic capabilities. Current features include turn-key installation, integration with enterprise security systems, and an advanced analytical platform that enables real-time information retrieval, statistical, geospatial and graph analyses, and visualizations.

To stay informed on product updates and release dates, contact us.

### Solutions

Acorn is applicable to a wide range of industries, including finance, healthcare, energy, consumer internet, and government. Users in these industries require a database with real-time data processing power, massive scalability, flexible fine grain data controls, and dynamic analytic capabilities. Acorn has all of these features and more.

### Consulting

If you are you interested in working with Accumulo or in setting up a pilot within your organization, we're here to help. Contact us for availability and pricing.

### Training

Whether you are looking for an introduction to Accumulo or are looking to be certified Accumulo developers, sqrrl engineers can help. Contact us for scheduling and pricing information on upcoming Apache Accumulo training sessions.
